item.title: One-Way ANOVA in Python
item.description: Installing and Loading the Reticulate Package This package allows us to run Python 3 inside R Markdown chunks. You will need Python 3 installed. There are details on how to do that in the Resources section. I also needed to change Reticulateâ€™s settings to point it at Python 3 on my Mac. You can find those details here. ======= knitr::opts_chunk$set('python', engine.path = '/usr/local/Cellar/python/3.6.5/bin/python3') Installing and Loading the Reticulate Package This package allows us to run Python 3 inside R Markdown chunks.
